members.joinCircumstances: Founded and leads the Franky Family as a gang of ship dismantlers in Water 7.
Serves as Franky's most trusted lieutenant and second-in-command.
One half of the Square Sisters, extremely loyal to Franky.
One half of the Square Sisters, extremely loyal to Franky.

keyMoments.title: Franky Family Beats Usopp
keyMoments.description: Members of the Franky Family brutally beat Usopp after Franky leaves, leaving him unconscious outside their headquarters.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Franky Family as antagonists willing to use violence and shows their loyalty to Franky's actions.

keyMoments.title: Franky Family Members Partying
keyMoments.description: The crew walks in on Franky Family members celebrating and partying with the stolen money at their headquarters.
keyMoments.significance: First proper showcase of the Franky Family's members and their hideout lifestyle.

keyMoments.title: Franky Family Defeated by Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: All Franky Family members present at the headquarters are completely overwhelmed and defeated by Luffy, Zoro, Sanji, and Chopper.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power difference between the Franky Family and the Straw Hat Pirates, humbling the gang.

jollyRoger.description: Unknown or not established in this episode

keyMoments.title: Raid on Franky House
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats storm Franky House to avenge Usopp's beating, prioritizing their friend's well-being over recovering the stolen money.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's core values of loyalty and protecting their nakama above all material concerns.

keyMoments.title: Complete Victory Over Franky Family
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Zoro, Sanji, and Chopper decisively defeat all Franky Family members at their headquarters.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Straw Hats' combat superiority in Water 7 and shows their growth since entering the Grand Line.

keyMoments.title: Decision to Say Goodbye to Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Luffy makes the painful decision that the crew must say goodbye to the Going Merry, their first ship.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most emotionally difficult decisions in the crew's history, marking a turning point in the Water 7 arc.
